sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const AboutMe = () => { return (

How i got into Software...

Hey, I am Arshad Ali, a software Developer (FULL-STACK) based out of Delhi, India Location. I have done my Graduation from{" "} Indraprastha University {" "} in Electronics(Major) and computer Science(Minor) but in the last year of my college, I have decided to focus more on Computer science which leads me to enter fully into the Software Domain.

During my college years, I attempted to build a business and had the opportunity to meet with{" "} NSRCEL's (IIMB) {" "} faculty to discuss my concept, but I believe I failed miserably. I use this rejection as motivation to learn new things and build Stuff, and I proudly wear the Failure badge as an honour rather than a mark of failure.

{/* Skills in table format */}
SKills

FRONTEND :- HTML,CSS,TAILWIND,BOOTSTRAP,REACT,JAVASCRIPT{" "}

BACKEND :- JAVA, SPRINGBOOT, NODE.JS, RESTAPI,SQL, AZURE CLOUD

OTHERS :-PROBLEM SOLVING, ALGORITHMS, VERSION CONTROL,UNIX

); }; export default AboutMe;
